snippet: A benefit for the National Theater draws a sparkling crowd to a new Broadway play.
abstract: National Theater's benefit gala at Barrymore Theater in Times Square draws sparkling crowd of celebrities to company production of play The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time.
lead_paragraph: A benefit for the National Theater draws a sparkling crowd to a new Broadway play.

headline.seo: Benefit for National Theater, Hosted by Anna Wintour, Draws Celebrities
headline.main: Celebrities Galore, but Only One Dog
headline.print_headline: Celebrities Galore, but Only One Dog
